rules_text:
[i]Renais' Avengers[/i] – Whenever Eirika & Ephraim, Sacred Twins enter or attack, sacrifice a land you control. If you do, search your library for two land cards and put them onto the battlefield, untap them, then shuffle.
[i]Sun and Moon[/i] – Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {G}. if you do, double target creatures base power and toughness until end of turn.
[i]Sacred Stones[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Forge X times, where X is the number of basic land types you control among lands you control.
